<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## NFTDropImpl class

Setup a collection of one-of-one NFTs that are minted as users claim them.

## Example

```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK("{{chainName}}");
const contract = sdk.getNFTDrop("{{contract_address}}");
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                                                   | Modifiers | Description                                                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(network, address, storage, options, abi, contractWrapper)](./sdk.nftdropimpl._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>NFTDropImpl</code> class |

| Method                                                                                                             | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [balance()](./sdk.nftdropimpl.balance.md)                                                                          |           | Get NFT Balance for the currently connected wallet                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [balanceOf(address)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.balanceof.md)                                                               |           | Get NFT Balance                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [burn(tokenId)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.burn.md)                                                                         |           | Burn a single NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [claim(quantity, checkERC20Allowance)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.claim.md)                                                 |           | Claim NFTs to the connected wallet.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [claimTo(destinationAddress, quantity, checkERC20Allowance)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.claimto.md)                         |           | Claim unique NFTs to a specific Wallet                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [createBatch(metadatas, options)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.createbatch.md)                                                |           | Create a batch of unique NFTs to be claimed in the future                                                                                                                                                             |
| [get(tokenId)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.get.md)                                                                           |           | Get a single NFT Metadata                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [getAddress()](./sdk.nftdropimpl.getaddress.md)                                                                    |           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [getAllClaimed(queryParams)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.getallclaimed.md)                                                   |           | Get All Claimed NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getAllUnclaimed(queryParams)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.getallunclaimed.md)                                               |           | Get All Unclaimed NFTs                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [getClaimTransaction(destinationAddress, quantity, checkERC20Allowance)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.getclaimtransaction.md) |           | Construct a claim transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a claim transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution. |
| [isApproved(address, operator)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.isapproved.md)                                                   |           | Get whether this wallet has approved transfers from the given operator                                                                                                                                                |
| [isTransferRestricted()](./sdk.nftdropimpl.istransferrestricted.md)                                                |           | Get whether users can transfer NFTs from this contract                                                                                                                                                                |
| [ownerOf(tokenId)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.ownerof.md)                                                                   |           | Get the current owner of a given NFT within this Contract                                                                                                                                                             |
| [totalClaimedSupply()](./sdk.nftdropimpl.totalclaimedsupply.md)                                                    |           | Get the claimed supply                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [totalSupply()](./sdk.nftdropimpl.totalsupply.md)                                                                  |           | Get the total count NFTs in this drop contract, both claimed and unclaimed                                                                                                                                            |
| [totalUnclaimedSupply()](./sdk.nftdropimpl.totalunclaimedsupply.md)                                                |           | Get the unclaimed supply                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [transfer(to, tokenId)](./sdk.nftdropimpl.transfer.md)                                                             |           | Transfer a single NFT                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
